Recipe.title: Ice Cream
Recipe.Description: Fresh-made Ice Cream (if done correctly) is way better than anything you will find in a store.

section.title: Flavoring Ideas
section.ingredient: Add and continue Ice Cream Maker for 5 minutes after Ice Cream is desired thickness.
Add and continue Ice Cream Maker for 5 minutes after Ice Cream is desired thickness.

section.instruction: In a pot, combine Egg Yolks and 1 Cup Sugar then mix well.
Stirring frequently, bring to a full boil, then remove from heat.
Add 1½ Cups Sugar, Cream, and Flavoring. (Make sure any chunks are very small.)
Chill in Ice Cream Maker until it is at desired thickness. (≈?? minutes)

Notes.note:
When at home, the Ice Cream Maker can be electric so nobody has to do any work to chill it.
When outdoors (like camping or picnics), there are also hand-crank Ice Cream Makers. But, you have to make sure they are constantly being cranked, so you'll want several people to take turns. &smiley;

Modifications.modification: Chilling time is less if you let it sit and cool for a while before putting in the Ice Cream Maker.
If you double the recipe, you can fit it all into a 6-Quart Ice Cream Maker
It is great by itself, but is a big kick if you serve it next to a hot dessert or if you serve it with toppings like fruit, chocolate syrup, caramel, etc.
